definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: Keep any loose items clear of the table and chuck.
sentences.chinese: 把桌上和卡盘上任何的不牢固的物件移开。

sentences.english: The chuck, in a sealed construction, may work for long life with wear-resistant parts.
sentences.chinese: 卡盘结构封闭式，零件耐磨损，使用寿命长。

sentences.english: The universal chuck has only three jaws .
The utility model is a multi-functional four-claw single-motion chuck.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型为多功能四爪单动卡盘。

sentences.english: I have however read a lot of books and have seen pictures of 4-jaw chucks .
sentences.chinese: 但是我读了许多书，看到过4张图片三爪卡盘。

sentences.english: Castings and wood patterns for the Gingery 4-jaw chuck.
sentences.chinese: 铸件和木材模式的金格里四爪卡盘。

sentences.english: Self-centering hydraulic power chuck is an accessory of CNC(Computer Numerical Control) machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 自定心液压动力卡盘是数控机床的功能部件。

sentences.english: The product is hand-operated independent chuck, with cylindrical center mount.
sentences.chinese: 该产品是手动的单动卡盘，短圆柱连接型。

sentences.english: Complete set of castings for the Gingery 4-jaw chuck plus one extra jaw.
sentences.chinese: 成套铸件的金格里四爪卡盘加上一个额外的下巴。

sentences.english: Rotate chuck so that full travel can be achieved for final torque setting.
sentences.chinese: 旋转卡盘使其能在最终扭矩设定时能达到全行程。

sentences.english: Equipped with leadscrew, chuck and cutter covers.
sentences.chinese: 配备与丝杠，卡盘和刀具封面。

sentences.english: Micro-sim tray, Camera with LED flash on back.
sentences.chinese: 微卡盘，相机背面的LED闪光灯。
